column1: # Title: Social exploitation among evolved and ancestral Myxococcus bacteria
# Data source: smith j, Van Dyken JD, and Zee PC (2010) A generalization of Hamilton's rule for the evolution of microbial cooperation. Science 328:1700. https://doi.org/10.1126/science.1189675
# Data authors: jeff smith, J. David Van Dyken, Peter C. Zee

# Description: Sporulation success of Myxococcus xanthus in mixed-genotype fruiting bodies. GVB206.3 is an experimentally evolved genotype resistant to rifampicin. GJV10 is an ancestral genotoype resistant to kanamycin.
# exptl_block: Experimental replicate (start date in lab notebook)
# initial_cells_evolved: Initial number of GVB206.3 cells (colony-forming units per plate). Part of experimental treatment.
# initial_cells_ancestral: Initial number of GJV10 cells (colony-forming units per plate). Part of experimental treatment.
# colonies_rif_1: Colony count on plates containing rifampicin
# colonies_rif_2: Colony count on plates containing rifampicin (second measurement)
# colonies_kan_1: Colony count on plates containing kanamycin
# colonies_kan_2: Colony count on plates containing kanamycin (second measurement)
# Note: Final spore count per strain = colonies * dilution
